entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio 2022 Template "ASP.NET Core Web App" converts hyphens to underscores in _Layout.cshtml css href, causing 404 on the css when debug/run. #44787
  • Blazor - Razor File - Renaming Injected Service Name Not Working in VS2022 17.3.6 #44786
  • [Blazor] CustomElement affects the results of MarkupString #44785

Closed

  • Blazor Webassembly .dll files cannot be downloaded #44784
  • Securing a SPA by Identityserver 6 before first load in .NET 6 #43452
    Discussions
  • Problem details of headers and query parameters are reported as fields #44683
  • [Minimal API] Http methods overload #44746
  • Blazor WASM integrity check failed behind corporate proxy (Zscaller) #44782
  • More granular tests for `TryParseQualityDouble` #2710
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add more granular tests for HeaderUtilities.TryParseQualityDouble #44574
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Support side-by-side transports in Kestrel #44657
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages (backport #43937) #44752
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2032312 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Set ApiParameterDescription.Type to `string` for Simple Types #44747
    area-web-frameworks
